item.title: IELTS Describing Trends
item.author: Young
item.description: DESCRIBING TRENDS UP rise (v): Production costs rose to their highest level of the year in July. rise (n): There was a rise in production costs to the highest level of the year. go up (v): Between 1900 and 2000, the population went up by over a million people. grow (grew, grown) (v): The number of first-time users grew rapidly in 2017. growth (n): There was solid growth in the number of first-time users in 2015.
